name: Flow ERC20 Factory
description: An ERC20 token that can be minted using any of the deployed Flow expressions. This token can be made conditionally soulbound by using the 'can transfer' expression.

expressions.name: Can transfer
expressions.description: An expression that determines whether this token can be transferred.

cells.name: From
cells.description: The address this token is being transferred from

cells.name: To
cells.description: The address this token is being transferred from

cells.name: amount
cells.description: The amount of this token being transferred

expressions.name: Flows
expressions.description: The available flows for this token.

cells.name: Flow ID
cells.description: The address of this flow (flow id)

cells.name: ID
cells.description: The id passed in when flowing

cells.name: Column 1 signer
cells.description: The signer of signed context column 1

cells.name: Column 2 signer
cells.description: The signer of signed context column 2

cells.name: Column 3 signer
cells.description: The signer of signed context column 3
